sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (MEMBERS_SEQ, GENDER, BIRTHYEAR, EMAIL, REG_EMAIL, REG_IP, UPD_EMAIL, UPD_IP, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PASSWORD ) VALUES (MEMBERS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #gender#, #birthyear#, #realId#, #realId#, '127.0.0.1', #realId#, '127.0.0.1', '130','140', #password#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL=#realId#
